        Parameters:
        outLink - the outgoing optical link

      • setID

        public void setID(int id)
        Sets the ID for this optical NIC. Each NIC in a router should have a unique ID so that it can be distinguished from other NICs in the router
        Parameters:
        id - the id of this NIC

      • getID

        public int getID()
        Returns the ID of this NIC
        Returns:
        ID of the NIC

      • getParent

        public Switch getParent()
        Returns the router that this NIC is in
        Returns:
        parent NIC

      • setClockwise

        public void setClockwise(java.lang.Boolean clockwise)
        Set if this NIC goes in a clockwise direction. Could be one way of telling the shortest path since we know the network design
        Parameters:
        clockwise - does the NIC go clockwise

      • getIsClockwise

        public java.lang.Boolean getIsClockwise()
        Returns whether this NIC goes in a clockwise direction
        Returns:
        does this NIC go clockwise

      • setIsOnRing

        public void setIsOnRing(java.lang.Boolean isOnRing)
        Set of this NIC is on a SONET ring. If the NIC is part of the ring wavelengths will be forwarded on it regardless of the wavelength destination
        Parameters:
        isOnRing - is this NIC on a SONET ring

      • getIsOnRing

        public java.lang.Boolean getIsOnRing()
        Returns whether or no this NIC is part of a SONET ring. If it is part of a ring then all wavelengths should be forwarded onto this NIC
        Returns:
        is this NIC on a SONET ring

      • setIsProtection

        public void setIsProtection(OpticalNIC workingNIC)
        Sets whether or not this NIC is a protection NIC for a working NIC
        Parameters:
        workingNIC - The working NIC for this backup NIC

      • getWorkingNIC

        public OpticalNIC getWorkingNIC()
        Returns the working NIC of this NIC, or null if this card is not a protection NIC
        Returns:
        the working NIC for this protection NIC

      • setIsWorking

        public void setIsWorking(OpticalNIC protectionNIC)
        Sets whether or not this NIC has a protection NIC
        Parameters:
        protectionNIC - The protection NIC for this working NIC

      • getProtectionNIC

        public OpticalNIC getProtectionNIC()
        Returns the protection NIC of this NIC, or null if this card does not have a protection NIC
        Returns:
        the protection NIC for this working NIC

      • setHasError

        public void setHasError(java.lang.Boolean hasError)
        Sets whether or not this NIC is in an error state for some reason
        Parameters:
        hasError - does this NIC have an error

      • getHasError

        public java.lang.Boolean getHasError()
        Gets whether or not this NIC is in an error state
        Returns:
        whether this NIC is in an error state

      • senseLight

        public void senseLight(java.lang.Boolean light)
        Tells this NIC if it is sensing light through the cable
        Parameters:
        light - does the link have light

      • sendPacket

        public java.lang.Boolean sendPacket(Packet packet,
                                    int wavelength)
        Sends a packet to the link that is joined to the output of this NIC
        Parameters:
        packet - the packet to be sent
        wavelength - the wavelength the packet will be sent on

      • receiveData

        public void receiveData(Packet packet,
                        int wavelength)
        This method is run when a packet is received from the input link joined to this NIC. It is then passed to the SONET router for routing
        Parameters:
        packet - the frame received
        wavelength - the wavelength it was received on
